en.start_unknown_2: I'm a prototype of a bot to help you to guide you for Cycling Jogja Event, and I can help you in many ways! Use /help to see what i can do.
en.start_unknown_3: If you want to authenticate with your  account so i can help you even more, use /login!
en.send_oauth_url: Great! Go to the [this]({}) url to authenticate yourself.
en.inform_oauth_procedure: Once you identify yourself, please send me the url it took you to.
en.already_login: You already identified yourself with your user, {}.
en.request_oauth_url: Please, send me the url it took you to.
en.login_done: Thanks {}, now I can do many more things!
en.url_error: Oops! There was en error! Send me the url again please.
en.logout_done: Good {}. You will be able to log in whenever you want using /login.
en.logout_failed: You did not identify with your account user, so you cannot log out {}...
en.notif_active: Good! From now on you will get notifications from your event that you have join!
en.notif_active_failed: To get notifications you need to be logged in (you can do that using /login).
en.notif_inactive: Ok! From now on you will stop recieving any notifications!
en.notif_already_inactive: Oh well! You did not even log in with your account. So I could not send you anything anyways.
en.notif_inactive_failed: You did not have them active already.
en.request_good_answer: What would have been coherent then?
en.select_language: The available languages are 'Ina' for Indonesian and 'en' for English.
en.wrong_lang_format: To change the language, you need to send me the command and the selected language, for example: /set_lang Ina.
